title: The Fig Tree - the two older women

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Porter uses literary elements and techniques to convey Miranda’s complex reaction as she observes the two older women.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Porter uses literary elements and techniques to convey Miranda’s complex reaction as she observes the two older women.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
